name: Super Greens Smoothie Pop
description: Cool off in the summer (or any time of year) with these nutrient-rich smoothie pops, packed with real fruits and greens for the ultimate healthy treat. They are a great alternative to the sugary popsicles on the market. At just 100 calories and less than $1 each, these pops are not just great for your body and your bank account—they taste great, too. Even your kids won’t be able to resist!
preparation: In blender, whirl together latte mix or spinach, coconut milk, kiwi, avocado, and lime juice.
Spoon 1 tsp dip mix into each ice pop mold. Pour mixture over top.
Insert sticks; freeze until firm, at least 4 hrs. To easily remove ice pops, run the mold under hot water until they loosen.
tips: Use the 2-in-1 Citrus Press to juice the lime.
When filling molds, add a few extra slices of kiwi.
